title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
descr: Collect and test samples to monitor results of nuclear experiments and contamination of humans, facilities, and environment.
alt_titles: Cathodic Protection Technician, Chemical Radiation Technician, Decontaminator, Health Physics Technician (HP Tech), Instrumentation Control Specialist, Laboratory Control Specialist, Metallographic Technician, Nuclear Chemistry Technician, Nuclear Control Technician, Nuclear Technician, Nuclear Worker Technician, Radiation Control Specialist, Radiation Control Technician (Radcon Technician), Radiation Monitor, Radiation Protection Monitor, Radiation Protection Specialist (RP Specialist), Radiation Protection Technician (RPT), Radiation Technician, Radiochemical Technician, Systems Protection Technician
experience: Previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is required for these occupations. For example, an electrician must have completed three or four years of apprenticeship or several years of vocational training, and often must have passed a licensing exam, in order to perform the job.
education: Most occupations in this zone require training in vocational schools, related on-the-job experience, or an associate's degree.
job_training: Employees in these occupations usually need one or two years of training involving both on-the-job experience and informal training with experienced workers. A recognized apprenticeship program may be associated with these occupations.
example: These occupations usually involve using communication and organizational skills to coordinate, supervise, manage, or train others to accomplish goals. Examples include hydroelectric production managers, desktop publishers, electricians, agricultural technicians, barbers, court reporters and simultaneous captioners, and medical assistants.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Inform supervisors when individual exposures or area radiation levels approach maximum permissible limits.
work_tasks.descr: Inform supervisors when individual exposures or area radiation levels approach maximum permissible limits.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Provide initial response to abnormal events or to alarms from radiation monitoring equipment.
work_tasks.descr: Provide initial response to abnormal events or to alarms from radiation monitoring equipment.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Brief workers on radiation levels in work areas.
work_tasks.descr: Brief workers on radiation levels in work areas.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Calculate safe radiation exposure times for personnel using plant contamination readings and prescribed safe levels of radiation.
work_tasks.descr: Calculate safe radiation exposure times for personnel using plant contamination readings and prescribed safe levels of radiation.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Determine intensities and types of radiation in work areas, equipment, or materials, using radiation detectors or other instruments.
work_tasks.descr: Determine intensities and types of radiation in work areas, equipment, or materials, using radiation detectors or other instruments.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Monitor personnel to determine the amounts and intensities of radiation exposure.
work_tasks.descr: Monitor personnel to determine the amounts and intensities of radiation exposure.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Instruct personnel in radiation safety procedures and demonstrate use of protective clothing and equipment.
work_tasks.descr: Instruct personnel in radiation safety procedures and demonstrate use of protective clothing and equipment.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Collect samples of air, water, gases, or solids to determine radioactivity levels of contamination.
work_tasks.descr: Collect samples of air, water, gases, or solids to determine radioactivity levels of contamination.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Analyze samples, such as air or water samples, for contaminants or other elements.
work_tasks.descr: Analyze samples, such as air or water samples, for contaminants or other elements.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Determine or recommend radioactive decontamination procedures, according to the size and nature of equipment and the degree of contamination.
work_tasks.descr: Determine or recommend radioactive decontamination procedures, according to the size and nature of equipment and the degree of contamination.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Set up equipment that automatically detects area radiation deviations and test detection equipment to ensure its accuracy.
work_tasks.descr: Set up equipment that automatically detects area radiation deviations and test detection equipment to ensure its accuracy.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Prepare reports describing contamination tests, material or equipment decontaminated, or methods used in decontamination processes.
work_tasks.descr: Prepare reports describing contamination tests, material or equipment decontaminated, or methods used in decontamination processes.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Operate manipulators from outside cells to move specimens into or out of shielded containers, to remove specimens from cells, or to place specimens on benches or equipment work stations.
work_tasks.descr: Operate manipulators from outside cells to move specimens into or out of shielded containers, to remove specimens from cells, or to place specimens on benches or equipment work stations.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Calibrate and maintain chemical instrumentation sensing elements and sampling system equipment, using calibration instruments and hand tools.
work_tasks.descr: Calibrate and maintain chemical instrumentation sensing elements and sampling system equipment, using calibration instruments and hand tools.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Immerse samples in chemical compounds to prepare them for testing.
work_tasks.descr: Immerse samples in chemical compounds to prepare them for testing.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Confer with scientists directing projects to determine significant events to monitor during tests.
work_tasks.descr: Confer with scientists directing projects to determine significant events to monitor during tests.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Place radioactive waste, such as sweepings or broken sample bottles, into containers for shipping or disposal.
work_tasks.descr: Place radioactive waste, such as sweepings or broken sample bottles, into containers for shipping or disposal.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Decontaminate objects by cleaning with soap or solvents or by abrading with wire brushes, buffing wheels, or sandblasting machines.
work_tasks.descr: Decontaminate objects by cleaning with soap or solvents or by abrading with wire brushes, buffing wheels, or sandblasting machines.

work_tasks.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_tasks.task: Enter data into computers to record characteristics of nuclear events or to locate coordinates of particles.
work_tasks.descr: Enter data into computers to record characteristics of nuclear events or to locate coordinates of particles.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.element_name: Communicating with People Outside the Organization
work_behaviors.descr: Communicating with people outside the organization, representing the organization to customers, the public, government, and other external sources. This information can be exchanged in person, in writing, or by telephone or e-mail.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Developing constructive and cooperative working relationships with others, and maintaining them over time.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Providing personal assistance, medical attention, emotional support, or other personal care to others such as coworkers, customers, or patients.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Convincing others to buy merchandise/goods or to otherwise change their minds or actions.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.element_name: Resolving Conflicts and Negotiating with Others
work_behaviors.descr: Handling complaints, settling disputes, and resolving grievances and conflicts, or otherwise negotiating with others.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.element_name: Performing for or Working Directly with the Public
work_behaviors.descr: Performing for people or dealing directly with the public. This includes serving customers in restaurants and stores, and receiving clients or guests.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.element_name: Coordinating the Work and Activities of Others
work_behaviors.descr: Getting members of a group to work together to accomplish tasks.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Encouraging and building mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the educational needs of others, developing formal educational or training programs or classes, and teaching or instructing others.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Providing guidance and direction to subordinates, including setting performance standards and monitoring performance.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the developmental needs of others and coaching, mentoring, or otherwise helping others to improve their knowledge or skills.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.element_name: Providing Consultation and Advice to Others
work_behaviors.descr: Providing guidance and expert advice to management or other groups on technical, systems-, or process-related topics.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Performing day-to-day administrative tasks such as maintaining information files and processing paperwork.

work_behaviors.title: Nuclear Monitoring Technicians
work_behaviors.descr: Monitoring and controlling resources and overseeing the spending of money.
